front.title: •Desperate Counter
front.gametext: Deploy on Death Star II system. When opponent moves from a related sector, for each TIE armed with a weapon there, movement destiny is -3 (limit -9). Also, you may deploy either Combat Response or Imperial Arrest Order from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The Empire relied on the skill of its pilot corps to defend the Death Star reactor core from attack.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
rulings: May deploy both Combat Response and Imperial Arrest Order in the same turn (as 2 separate actions).
